document_data.name: Zarlandris
document_data.mainbody: '''Zarlandris''' was a [[black dragon]] and [[great wyrm]], who was killed on [[Tarsakh 17]], [[1373 DR]] when he attacked [[Highmoon]], [[Deepingdale]]'s capital.{{Cite dragon/Cormanthor: War Amidst the Trees|71}}
